*YouTube Shorts Blocker*
Description
Are you tired of getting distracted by YouTube Shorts? Introducing YouTube Shorts Blocker, a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that helps you maintain your productivity by blocking YouTube Shorts. This extension automatically hides Shorts videos and prevents you from accessing the YouTube Shorts section, ensuring that you stay focused on your main tasks.

                                         *Key Features*
~Automatic Blocking: Blocks YouTube Shorts every 5 seconds to ensure a distraction-free experience.
~Undo Functionality: Easily undo the block if you want to view Shorts temporarily.
~Lightweight and Efficient: Minimal impact on browser performance.
~User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive UI for easy use.
                                           *How to Use* 
~Install the Extension: Click the “Add to Chrome” button to install YouTube Shorts Blocker.
Enjoy a Distraction-Free YouTube: With the blocker enabled, you will automatically be redirected from YouTube Shorts and keep your focus on more important content.
